mapper.sql: ID AS id, USER_ID AS userId, NICK_NAME AS nickName, GENDER AS gender, LANGUAGE AS language, CITY AS city, PROVINCE AS province, COUNTRY AS country, AVATAR_URL AS avatarUrl, DESCRIPTION as description, LEVEL as level, CREDIT_LEVEL as creditLevel, FAVTYPE1 as favType1, FAVTYPE2 as favType2,FAVTYPE3 as favType3, FIRST_LOGIN_TIME as firstLoginTime, LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime, OPEN_ID as openId,LATITUDE as latitude,LONGTITUDE as longitude,LOGIN_CITY as loginCity
mapper.select: select MAX(USER_ID) as USER_ID from t_user

select t.ID AS id, t.USER_ID AS userId, t.NICK_NAME AS nickName, t.GENDER AS gender, t.LANGUAGE AS language, t.CITY AS city, t.PROVINCE AS province, t.COUNTRY AS country, t.AVATAR_URL AS avatarUrl, t.DESCRIPTION as description, t.LEVEL as level, t.CREDIT_LEVEL as creditLevel, t.FAVTYPE1 as favType1, t.FAVTYPE2 as favType2,t.FAVTYPE3 as favType3, t.FIRST_LOGIN_TIME as firstLoginTime, t.LAST_LOGIN_TIME as lastLoginTime, t.OPEN_ID as openId,t.LATITUDE as latitude,t.LONGTITUDE as longitude,t.LOGIN_CITY as loginCity from (select u.ID, u.USER_ID, u.NICK_NAME, u.GENDER, u.LANGUAGE, u.CITY, u.PROVINCE, u.COUNTRY, u.AVATAR_URL, u.DESCRIPTION, u.LEVEL, u.CREDIT_LEVEL, u.FAVTYPE1, u.FAVTYPE2,u.FAVTYPE3, u.FIRST_LOGIN_TIME, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME, u.OPEN_ID,u.LATITUDE,u.LONGTITUDE,u.LOGIN_CITY, ua.ACT_ID, ua.JOINER_TYPE from t_user u join t_useractivity ua on u.USER_ID = ua.USER_ID) as t where t.ACT_ID = #{actId}
